can-do.translation[0].definitions[0].def: willing to try anything and expect that it will work
can-do.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He has a wonderful can-do attitude towards work.
can-do.translation[1].definitions[0].def: having a strong belief that you can succeed in getting things done, and willing to try hard and use any method to do this
can-do.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He has a can-do attitude and knows how to work with colleagues to get things done.
